ModMetaData.name: Arcane Technology 1.5
ModMetaData.author: Ferris, Dametri, GwinnBleidd
ModMetaData.description: Restrict weapon and armor usage until the technology has been researched Fixed for Simple Sidearms/ArmorRacks, If you want another mod to be added to the patch list for avoiding equipment feel free to dm me or add a comment I will aim to maintain this!
